tileset = "sandcave";
area = "sandcave_ddt";
areaname = "Sandflow Caves";
ambience = {ra:90,rb:0,ga:60,gb:0,ba:100,bb:0,aa:100,ab:0};
dungeon = "sandcave";
A_sprites = [{name:"N",model:"DOOR10",x:16,y:1,dest:["Temple_DARK_entr",6,16],dir:"n"},{name:"S",model:"area_transition",x:10,y:44,dest:["citadel1",10,24],dir:"n"}];
areaLoot = [{x:6,y:4,amount:1,item:"Golden Circlet"},{x:9,y:22,amount:1,item:"Silver Ore"},{x:6,y:27,amount:1,item:"Power Drink"},{x:21,y:26,amount:1,item:"PhoenixPinion"},{x:34,y:54,amount:1,item:"Candriathope"}];
foes = MONSTER_TABLES.SANDCAVE;
btlChance = 4;
minSteps = 5;
levelrange = [25,28];
musicTrack = "SandflowCaves";
AreaSetup({WARP:Boolean(GameData.plotVars.DONE_CH3_INTRO)});
EN_ADD("Places","Sandflow Caves");
